name: html-eslint-example
description: Proof of concept: Modifying HTML with ESLint using @html-eslint. Example: npm run eslint.fix to modify HTML files having a fixer method specified. Sources of inspiration: [https://github.com/eslint/eslint/blob/main/docs/_examples/custom-rule-tutorial-code/eslint.config.js, https://github.com/yeonjuan/html-eslint/tree/main/packages/eslint-plugin/lib/rules]
author: jstpierre2906@outlook.com
